Name: polrelid
Description: the table to which the policy applies

Name: polcmd
Description: the command type to which the policy is applied: r for select, a for insert, w for update, d for delete, or * for all

Name: polpermissive
Description: is the policy permissive or restrictive?

Name: polroles
Description: the roles to which the policy is applied

Name: polqual
Description: the expression tree to be added to the security barrier qualifications for queries that use the table

Name: polwithcheck
Description: the expression tree to be added to the with check qualifications for queries that attempt to add rows to the table
